nodes.text: Building snaps were a type of toy used by children in the Chiss Ascendancy. Around 18 BBY, the sky-walker Che'ri kept building snaps in her quarters on the Chiss warship Springhawk, which her caregiver, Mitth'ali'astov, suggested that she play with during her downtime. Che'ri, however, was uninterested in playing and instead wanted to meet members of the Paccosh species along with adult members of the Springhawk's crew.
Building snaps were mentioned in the 2021 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Greater Good, written by Timothy Zahn.
